alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:49AM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Sweetwater County including Rock Springs and Green River. * WHEN...Through 5 PM. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult in rural areas, including along Interstate 80. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Eastbound Interstate 80 is closed east of Rock Springs to Rawlins.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions go to wyoroad.info or call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
